title: Ticket #5817: Spurious Docker containers occasionally left running
description:
When using the Docker universe I've occasionally seen running Docker containers being left around for jobs which HTCondor believes are no longer running.

Example: I recently had some occurrences of systemd killing all HTCondor daemons on worker nodes. Docker containers for all jobs currently running at the time continued running, but HTCondor was not aware of this, therefore the jobs had effectively escaped from HTCondor's control.
